title: Extreme Animals

description: Extreme Animals introduces some fascinating members of the animal kingdom. Discover which fish can climb a tree and which creature tastes food with its feet! Includes clever illustrations. Book and lesson also available at Levels K and Q.
highFrequencyWords: creatures, extreme, mammals, quietest, remarkable, reptiles, sensors, territory, transparent
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
